courseleaf.title: Academic Calendar
courseleaf.text:
Please note that the calendar below is subject to change. For the most up-to-date information as well as future calendars, please visit the Office of the Registrar website.

Other important dates and deadlines can also be found on the Student Enrollment Calendar.

Please also review Campus Policies and Guidelines regarding the Academic Calendar and Student Accommodations, as well as the Religious Creed Policy.

For further information regarding Reading/Review/Recitation week, please click here. 

For Summer Sessions registration dates and deadlines, please see the Summer Sessions website.

Add the Academic Calendar to bCal

For PDFs of current and future Berkeley Academic Calendars, visit the Calendar page on the Office of the Registrar website. See the instructions at the bottom of the page to "Add a Calendar to Your bCal."

Fall Semester 2020

Academic Calendar
Event Date
Fall Semester Begins Wednesday, August 19, 2020
Convocation To Be Determined
Instruction Begins Wednesday, August 26, 2020
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Labor Day) Monday, September 7, 2020
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Veterans Day) Wednesday, November 11, 2020
Non-Instructional Day Wednesday, November 25, 2020
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Thanksgiving) Thursday, November 26 & Friday, November 27, 2020
Classes End Friday, December 4, 2020
Reading/Review/Recitation Week Monday, December 7–Friday, December 11, 2020
Last Day of Instruction Friday, December 11, 2020
Final Examinations Monday, December 14–Friday, December 18, 2020
Fall Semester Ends Friday, December 18, 2020
Winter Commencement To Be Determined, commencement.berkeley.edu
Academic & Administrative Holidays (Winter Holidays) Thursday, December 24 & Friday, December 25, 2020
Academic & Administrative Holiday (New Year's) Thursday, December 31, 2020 & Friday, January 1, 2021

Spring Semester 2021

Academic Calendar
Event Date
Spring Semester Begins Tuesday, January 12, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Martin Luther King, Jr. Day) Monday, January 18, 2021
Instruction Begins (fully remote for first two weeks) Tuesday, January 19, 2021
Limited in-person instruction begins (if public health conditions allow) Monday, February 1, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Presidents' Day) Monday, February 15, 2021
Spring Recess Monday, March 22–Friday, March 26, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Cesar Chavez Day) Friday, March 26, 2021
Instruction Resumes (fully remote for first week) Monday, March 29, 2021
Limited In-Person Instruction Resumes (if public health conditions allow) Monday, April 5, 2021
Cal Day To Be Determined, calday.berkeley.edu
Classes End Friday, April 30, 2021
Reading/Review/Recitation Week Monday, May 3–Friday, May 7, 2021
Last Day of Instruction Friday, May 7, 2021
Final Examinations Monday, May 10–Friday, May 14, 2021
Spring Semester Ends Friday, May 14, 2021
Commencement Saturday, May 15, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Memorial Day) Monday, May 31, 2021

Summer Sessions 2021

Academic Calendar
Event Date
Session A (Six-Weeks) Begins Monday, May 24, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Memorial Day) Monday, May 31, 2021
Session B (Ten-Weeks) Begins Monday, June 7, 2021
Session C (Eight-Weeks) Begins Monday, June 21, 2021
Session A (Six-Weeks) Ends Friday, July 2, 2021
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Independence Day) Monday, July 5, 2021
Session D (Six-Weeks) Begins Tuesday, July 6, 2021
Session E (Three-Weeks) Begins Monday, July 26, 2021
Sessions B, C, D, and E end Friday, August 13, 2021
